description: Class representative of the class that Shinji and the other Eva pilots attend. She has a by-the-book demeanour and takes her responsibilities as "class rep" seriously. Although she frequently bickers with Touji, she reveals to Asuka that she has an enormous crush on Touji but is unable to openly express her feelings to him. She also appears to be Asuka`s only friend. Hikari is an accomplished cook who appears to take care of her two sisters.
name: Horaki Hikari
